channel.title: Knowledge Bits - Software
channel.description: References I wish I'd already found

item.title: Special Version Control Files
item.description: A list of version control system-specific files that one may find in the working directories of common version control systems

item.title: All About reStructuredText Hyperlinks
item.description: Writing the various hyperlink syntaxes in reStructuredText, along with internal hyperlinks and styling link text
item.dc:creator: John T. Wodder II

item.title: Unicode and LaTeX
item.description: How to configure LaTeX to accept UTF-8 input (or just use XeLaTeX/LuaLaTeX instead)
item.dc:creator: John T. Wodder II
